parameters.responseBody:
{
  "success": {{ $('Phoenix CV Assembler').first().json.success }},
  "message": "üìÑ Phoenix CV g√©n√©r√© avec succ√®s !",
  "data": {
    "cv_id": "{{ $('Phoenix CV Assembler').first().json.cv_id }}",
    "quality_score": {{ $('Phoenix CV Assembler').first().json.quality_score }},
    "ats_score": {{ $('Phoenix CV Assembler').first().json.ats_score }},
    "generation_time_s": {{ $('Phoenix CV Assembler').first().json.generation_time_s }},
    "co2_impact_grams": {{ $('Phoenix CV Assembler').first().json.co2_impact_grams }},
    "template_used": "{{ $('Phoenix CV Assembler').first().json.template_id }}",
    "sections_count": {{ $('Phoenix CV Assembler').first().json.metadata.sections_count }},
    "premium_features_used": {{ JSON.stringify($('Phoenix CV Assembler').first().json.premium_features_used) }},
    "recommendations_count": {{ $('Phoenix CV Assembler').first().json.recommendations.length }}
  },
  "phoenix_version": "2.0.0",
  "timestamp": "{{ $('Phoenix CV Assembler').first().json.metadata.timestamp }}"
}
